title: Transport Items
description: Allows a mob to transport items from and to containers

source_container_types.title: Source Container Types
source_container_types.description: A list of block descriptors that should be a container type to get items from. Default is any container

destination_container_types.title: Destination Container Types
destination_container_types.description: A list of block descriptors that should be a container type to put items in. Default is any container

max_stack_size.title: Max Stack Size
max_stack_size.description: The maximum stack size that the mob will try to take from a container.

interaction_time.title: Interaction Time
interaction_time.description: The amount of time spent interacting with the containers in seconds.

allow_simultaneous_interaction.title: Allow Simultaneous Interaction
allow_simultaneous_interaction.description: Whether the entity is allowed to simultaneously interact with a container that another non-player entity is already interacting with.

search_strategy.title: Search Strategy
search_strategy.description: Whether to select the nearest valid container or a random valid container in range.

search_distance.title: Search Distance
search_distance.description: The maximum horizontal and vertical distance at which to find containers for taking or placing items.

max_visited_containers.title: Max Visited Containers
max_visited_containers.description: The maximum number of containers the mob will visit before resetting. 0 is unlimited.

initial_cooldown.title: Initial Cooldwon
initial_cooldown.description: ime, in seconds, the mob will wait after spawning or after its available goals have changed (e.g. due to a component group update).

idle_cooldown.title: Idle Cooldown
idle_cooldown.description: When the mob cannot find a valid container to interact with, the goal will be disabled for this amount of time in seconds.

place_strategy.title: Place Strategy
place_strategy.description:
The strategy to use for placing the transported item.
Any - always place if there is room,
With matching - place if there is a matching item in the container,
With matching or empty - like With matching but will also place in empty containers.

allowed_items.description: A list of item descriptors that are the only items the mob is allowed to transport. If this and "disallowed_items" are both empty, then all items are allowed. If non-empty "disallowed_items" must be empty. Default value: empty.

disallowed_items.description: A list of item descriptors that are the mob is not allowed to transport. If non-empty "allowed_items" must be empty. Default value: emtpy.
